contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Zuidzijde | settlement_type = Hamlet | other_name = <!-- if different from name --> | native_name = <!-- if different from name --> | native_name_lang = nl | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = | image_shield = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = LocatieKorendijk.png | map_caption = | image_map1 = Map NL - Korendijk - Zuidzijde.svg | map_caption1 = Zuidzijde in the municipality of Korendijk. | pushpin_map = <!-- Netherlands --> | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_caption = Location in the Netherlands | subdivision_type = [[List of sovereign states|Country]] | subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] | subdivision_type1 = [[Provinces of the Netherlands|Province]] | subdivision_name1 = [[South Holland]] | subdivision_type2 = [[List of municipalities of the Netherlands|Municipality]] | subdivision_name2 = [[Korendijk]] | leader_title = | leader_name = | leader_party = | latd = 51|latm = 46|lats = 52|latNS = N | longd= 4|longm = 21|longs= 51|longEW= E | coordinates_region = NL | coordinates_type = region:NL_type:city(220) | coordinates_display = inline,title | coordinates_footnotes = | elevation_m = | elevation_min_m = | elevation_max_m = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | established_title = | established_date = | population_footnotes = <!-- for references: use <ref> tags --> | population_total = 220 | population_as_of = 2007 | population_demonym = | population_note = | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] | utc_offset = +1 | timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] | utc_offset_DST = +2 | postal_code_type = [[List of postal codes in the Netherlands|Postal code]] | postal_code = | area_code_type = [[Telephone numbers in the Netherlands|Dialing code]] | area_code = | website = | footnotes = }} '''Zuidzijde''' is a town in the [[Netherlands|Dutch]] province of [[South Holland]]. It is a part of the municipality of [[Korendijk]], and lies approximatel 7 km south of [[Spijkenisse]]. The statistical area "Zuidzijde", which also can include the surrounding countryside, has a population of around 230.<ref name="CBS2">Statistics Netherlands (CBS), [http://statline.cbs.nl/ ''Statline: Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2003-2005'']. As of 1 January 2005.</ref> ==References== <!--This article uses the Cite.php citation mechanism. If you would like more information on how to add references to this article, please see http://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Cite/Cite.php --> <references /> [[Category:Populated places in South Holland]] {{SouthHolland-geo-stub}}
